title: Start
body:
<<outfit Aig Casual>>
<<outfit Lee Casual>>
<<flip Lee>>
<<expression Lee Neutral>>
<<expression Aig Neutral>>
<<move Aig StageRight2>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
*cough*
*cough cough*
*COUGH COUGH COUGH*
Ahhhhgggg....ow.
<<name Friendship Lee>>
<<move Lee StageLeft2>>
Greeting, Aigburth.
<<flip Aig>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
*cough* Greetings *cough* Lee.
<<name Friendship Lee>>
Are you ill?
<<name Friendship Aig>>
What? *cough* No, no.
I've just been spending a lot of time in the vocal studio lately, and I think I might have- 
*COUGH!* 
...blown out my voice.
Which really *cough* sucks because the debut is *cough* only a week away.
<<flip Aig>>
*COUGH* *COUGH* *COUGH*
<<flip Aig>>
Sorry, I can't really-
<<flip Aig>>
*COUGH*
<<flip Aig>>
-talk.

title: Good
body:
<<name Friendship Lee>>
Hang on, I have just the thing.
I heard that if you gargle table salt and tap water, it'll loosen up your vocal cords.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
Does that *cough* actually work?
<<name Friendship Lee>>
Sure it does.
<<flip Lee>> 
I'll be right back.
<<move Lee OffStageLeft>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
*cough* *cough* *cough*
Ack! Oof.
<<name Friendship Lee>>
<<flip Lee>>
<<move Lee StageLeft1>>
<<name Friendship Lee>>
Here you are.
<<move Lee CenterStage>>
Drink.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
Lee, I don't know about *cough* this.
<<name Friendship Lee>>
Trust me.
->Alright.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    Eh...
    Alright.
    <<move Aig StageRight1>>
    *glug glug glug glug*
    ...
    <<flip Aig>>
    <<move Lee StageLeft2>>
    *BLARGH!*
    EHHH!!!
    Oh my god!
    OH. MY. GOD!
    <<flip Aig>>
    <<expression Aig Angry>>
    Lee! That was NOT water!
    OR salt!
    What the hell was that?!
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    ...
    w-
    ..water...
    ...and...
    ...
    ...salt?
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig Neutral>>
    ...
    Lee...do you know what water is, right?
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    ...
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    Lee, it's important to me that you know what water is.
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    ...
    <<statDown Friendship Lee>>
    <<expression Lee Angry>>
    You're attacking me right now, and I don't much like that kind of thing.
    <<flip Lee>>
    You're welcome for fixing your voice.
    <<move Lee OffStageLeft>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    Lee! You didn't-
    ...oh,
    ...oh my god.
    <<flip Aig>>
    My throat feels amazing!
    <<flip Aig>>
    Wait! Lee! Come back!
    <<move Aig OffStageRight>>
->I'm good.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    Thanks Lee, but, uh...*cough*...I think I'm good.
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    Suit yourself.
    <<flip Lee>>
    *glug glug glug glug*
    Ah!
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    Lee.
    W-what are you doing?
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    <<flip Lee>>
    Living my best life.
    I suggest you do the same.
    If your throat hurts, just lay off the vocal training.
    Your voice is plently good enough for the debut, you just need to rest it for a bit.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig Happy>>
    Aw, Lee!
    That's *cough* really nice of you to say.
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    ...
    ...
    <<statUp Friendship Lee>>
    ...
    <<flip Lee>>
    Farewell, Aigburth.
    <<move Lee OffStageLeft>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig Happy>>
    Thanks *cough* Lee!
